UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Fowlicidin-3 is an alpha-helical cationic host defense peptide with potent antibacterial and lipopolysaccharide-neutralizing activities.
Literature.Author: Bommineni YR, Dai H, Gong YX, Soulages JL, Fernando SC, Desilva U, Prakash O, Zhang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=9 µM,Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cell death=12 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=1µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-39(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=2µM)
